---
title: "Toolik Lake Biogeochemistry Data"
author: "Jaslyn Miura"
format: html
---

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)

```
```{r}

toolik_biochem <- read_csv(here::here("data", "2011_Kling_Akchem.csv"), na = c(".", "NA")) %>% clean_names()

```

```{r}

inlet_biochem <- toolik_biochem %>%
  filter(site == "Toolik Inlet") %>%
  select(p_h, doc_u_m, tdn_u_m)


apply(X = inlet_biochem, MARGIN = 2, FUN = mean, na.rm = TRUE)



```
